sections.heading: to 24-6-11 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1995, ch. 116, § 16 repealed 24-6-1 through 24-6-11 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 105, §§ 1 to 9, and Laws 1987 ch. 74, §§ 3 and 4, respectively, relating to anatomical gifts, effective July 1, 1995. For provisions of the former sections,seethe 1994 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.For present comparable provisions,seeChapter 24, Article 6A NMSA 1978.
